alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 7:19PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Wakulla, southeastern Liberty and northeastern Franklin Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 719 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles south of Crawfordville, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Crawfordville, St. Marks, Sopchoppy, Shadeville, Morgan Place, Saint Teresa, Turkey Point, Bald Point, Hyde Park, Panacea-Wakulla Airport, Mcintyre, Sanborn, Tully, Panacea, Shell Point, Port Leon, Medart, Wakulla Beach and Buckhorn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Liberty
